name: @graphdb/core
description: An in-memory database with sync capabilities â€” zero runtime deps
author: Alex Casillas

scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target bun --external @graphdb/types
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.cjs --format cjs --target bun --external @graphdb/types
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:types && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs
